```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

I'm creating this record to frequently refer when creating technical documents.  

Help taken from- [Blog by "R Pruim"](https://rpruim.github.io/s341/S19/from-class/MathinRmd.html#:~:text=Math%20inside%20RMarkdown,%24%24%20for%20%E2%80%9Cdisplayed%20equations%E2%80%9D.)  

Mathematical representations with RMarkdown/LaTeX notations:  


1. $x = y$              `$x = y$`
2. $x / y$              `$x / y$`   
3. $x ^ y$              `$x ^ y$`  
4. $x \le y$            `$x \le y$`  
5. $x \ge y$            `$x \ge y$`
